mapper.select: select concat('s', max((substr(s_code, 2)) + 1)) as new_code from tbl_store;
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_store(s_code, s_name, s_location, s_tel, s_rating, s_status, s_order, s_waiting, s_c_code, s_photo, s_admin, x, y) values(#{s_code}, #{s_name}, #{s_location}, #{s_tel}, #{s_rating}, #{s_status}, #{s_order}, #{s_waiting}, #{s_c_code}, #{s_photo}, #{s_admin}, #{x}, #{y})
mapper.select: select s.*, c.c_type from tbl_store s, tbl_category c where s.s_c_code = c.c_code
select s.*, m.m_name from tbl_store s, tbl_menu m where s.s_code = m.s_code and (s.s_name like concat('%', #{query}, '%') or m.m_name like concat('%', #{query}, '%')) group by s.s_code
select s.*, c.c_type from tbl_store s, tbl_category c where s.s_c_code = c.c_code and ${column} like concat('%', #{query}, '%') limit #{start}, #{num}
select count(*) from tbl_store where ${column} like concat('%', #{query}, '%')
